Volunteer With Us

No Experience Necessary ¬∑ You Won't Remember Anyway

üßµ Garment Assembly

Help stitch, measure, and fit garments for aquatic residents. Training provided daily (because no one remembers yesterday's training).

8-12 hrs/week ¬∑ All skill levels

üß≠ Building Tracker

Monitor the building's geographic drift and update our (frequently outdated) address records with local postal services.

Flexible ¬∑ GPS literacy preferred

üìã Memory Liaison

Serve as an external memory resource for staff. Read them their own notes. Remind them of their names. Deeply rewarding work.

4-6 hrs/week ¬∑ Patience required

üìä Data Re-Entry

Our databases lose coherence approximately every 72 hours. Help re-enter donor records, inventory counts, and species profiles from laminated backup cards.

10+ hrs/week ¬∑ Detail-oriented
Volunteer hours may not be accurately tracked. If you have volunteered with us before, we apologize for not recognizing you. Background checks are performed but results are typically forgotten before they can be reviewed.
